General.Name: Ningbo Haitian Precision Machinery Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Haitian Precision Machinery Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of machine tools in China. It offers various vertical machining center, double column machining center, horizontal machining center, CNC vertical lathe, CNC turning center, and other products. The company's products are used in automotive, rail transit, mold manufacturing, construction machinery, machinery manufacturing, and other industries. In addition, it offers after sale and overhaul services. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Dagang Tianxin Machinery Co., Ltd. Ningbo Haitian Precision Machinery Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Ningbo, China.
General.Address: No. 235, Huangshan West Road, Ningbo, China

1.Name: Mr. Chen  Yun
1.Title: Chief Financial Director and Sec. of the Board
